feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing implemented landing page features and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing auto-generated summaries for many frontend components and hooks.
frontend/docs/landing-customization.md: Guide explaining landing page structure and how to change the APK download link.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens and dark/light modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper with dark theme enforcement and React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/landing/download: Hardcoded APK download URL and shared download handler.
frontend/src/components/landing/effects/: Mouse‑tracking glow effect hidden on touch devices.
frontend/src/components/landing/GlassPan: Reusable glass panel wrapper component with optional strong variant.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Fau: CSS for FaultyTerminal WebGL effect container and canvas sizing.
WebGL shader‑based animated terminal effect with noise, glitch, and scanline uniforms.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Her: Canvas‑based particle and subtle aura background for the hero section.
frontend/src/components/landing/landingC: Centralized landing config wiring CTA behaviors and download URL reference.
Defines all static landing page copy and section IDs used across components.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes all landing sections and cursor glow into the main scroll flow.
frontend/src/components/landing/Responsi: Responsive layout container applying consistent padding and max-width.
Generic section wrapper with scroll-reveal fade/translate animation.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: Renders a full-width section displaying the animated ASCII 'KARM' text.
Shows an image and the cult-line text from landing copy within a centered section.
Displays the final call‑to‑action with a download button and footer credit.
Implements the hero section with animated background, wordmark, tagline, and primary/secondary CTAs.
Animates psychological‑hit lines as they appear using an IntersectionObserver.
Renders short social‑proof lines from landing copy in a centered section.
Renders three feature blocks describing what the product does using landing copy.
frontend/src/components/landing/three/As: Implements a Three.js ASCII rendering system with custom shaders and a filter class.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for initializing, logging in, and managing Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Calculates parallax offset based on scroll progress for a referenced element.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file noting that the backend exposes no query methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Exposes a hook that marks elements visible once they enter view using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode variables, and custom utility classes including glass effects, animations, and CTA styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors tied to CSS variables, extended theme settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes current project requirements and planned features, mainly adding ASCII Three.js hero text, inserting an image, and adjusting landing page text.
